data.title: Orhan Pamuk – Prize presentation
data.meta_description: The Nobel Prize in Literature 2006 was awarded to Orhan Pamuk "who in the quest for the melancholic soul of his native city has discovered new symbols for the clash and interlacing of cultures"
data.text:
Orhan Pamuk

Prize presentation

Your browser does not support the video tag.

Watch a video clip of the 2006 Nobel Laureate in Literature, Orhan Pamuk, receiving his Nobel Prize medal and diploma during the Nobel Prize Award Ceremony at the Concert Hall in Stockholm, Sweden, on 10 December 2006.

To cite this section
